EmailTemplate.name: Out of Stock Catalog Request
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
Thank you for reaching out to us at YETI. We have received your request to obtain a YETI catalog. We are currently completely out of this past seasons catalog. As soon as the next YETI dispatch is released, one will be sent to the address youâ€™ve provided. For the most updated information regarding our products check out YETI.com.
Kind regards,
